Contact Mayor and City Council

We are committed to fostering open communication between our city officials and the community. As part of this commitment, we encourage you to reach out directly to the Mayor and City Council members via email. Your thoughts, concerns, and suggestions are invaluable in helping us serve you better. Your input plays a crucial role in shaping policies and initiatives that affect our community. Whether you have questions about local projects, want to express your opinions on city matters, or need assistance with city services, we are here to listen.
